name: You Are (Not) Alone (stone demon)
description:
This is my game jam project, still have not completed the sound

story:

After human civilization was destroyed. You as a robot wandering on endless roads, hoping to find another robot like you. Fight not only by the mutated monsters out there but also running out of fuel supplies. Will you survive?

how to play? :  move = aswd , attack =left mouse,c to crouch, shift to run,

run = made noise

can zoom in/out

up/down arrow to switch items

music made by TrackTribe 

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
